Articles.Content: New to the MKS/OKS mod, and have a couple of questions. what are the punch cards, what do they do, and how to get them? I had been waiting for beta to come out before using this mod. bit of a learning curve, but that's half the fun!

It is a universal resource used to operate every other module in the mod. It is generated by kerbals in a colony command center (C3) modules. Pretty sure you can also trade those things around between several colonies by some antennas, though I always design everything to be self sustainable anyway, so haven't tried that features.

Also, check the tutorial and FAQ.

Edited January 4, 2015 by RainDreamer
